title: Interactive Multimedia-Based Science Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone operation skills and elementary-level science knowledge
context.additional_context: Learners primarily access online content via smartphones, sharing tablets or public digital equipment during in-person classes; scientific concepts should be explained through everyday life examples to enhance understanding

learning_goals: Learners can explain principles of scientific phenomena with over 80% accuracy through scenario-based formative assessments
Learners are assessed on their ability to represent science concepts visually and auditorily using multimedia materials
Learners apply self-directed learning strategies while revising educational scenarios based on feedback

resources: Public Institution Digital Equipment Rental Service
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
